ingredients.ingredient: 1 medium acorn squash, halved and seeded

cookingTips: Squash is easier to halve if microwaved for 2-3 minutes first
Place cut-side down on the baking sheet for even cooking
Squash is done when flesh is very tender and slightly caramelized
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me safely prepare and roast the acorn squash halves until they're golden and the flesh is tender.
